title: TaxThemis
problem: Tax authorities face a significant "tax gap" due to tax evasion, specifically Related Party Transaction-based Tax Evasion (RPTTE).
visualization: Bar charts, Node-link Diagrams, Heat Maps, Arc-diagram based glyphs

title: FraudAuditor
problem: Collusive fraud in health insurance is difficult to detect because fraudulent medical visits are highly similar to normal visits.
visualization: Bar charts, Node-link Diagrams, Radar Charts, Heat Maps, Sequence visualization

title: Bitcoin Exchange Evolution
problem: Cryptocurrency exchanges dominate Bitcoin circulation, yet existing tools lack capacity for multi-dimensional transaction patterns.
visualization: Massive Sequence View, Node-link Diagrams, Parallel Bars, Triangle Selector

title: FinGraph
problem: Investors and regulators struggle to detect systemic risks and anomalies in complex, multi-layered financial networks.
visualization: Hierarchical Graph View, Temporal Trends, Risk Heatmaps

title: NFTracer
problem: Stakeholders in the NFT market face high investment risks like rug pulls and irrational price volatility.
visualization: Parallel Coordinates, Scatter plots, Area charts

title: EconMap
problem: Visualizing global economic indicators across time and geography remains challenging for policymakers.

title: BankSafe
problem: Banks need to identify money laundering patterns in real-time across millions of daily transactions.
visualization: Flow Diagrams, Cluster Views, Transaction Timelines

title: PortfolioVis
problem: Portfolio managers lack tools to visualize the correlation between disparate asset classes during market shocks.

title: CreditWatch
problem: Traditional credit scoring lacks transparency, making it hard for lenders to justify loan rejections.
visualization: SHAP Values, Force-directed Graphs, Decision Trees

title: Guarantee Loan Risk
problem: Enterprises back each other to obtain loans, creating 'guarantee circles' that hide systemic risks.

title: MarketSonar
problem: High-frequency traders need to detect market manipulation patterns like spoofing in milliseconds.

title: AuditFlow
problem: Auditors struggle to verify corporate accounts when transactions involve hundreds of subsidiaries.

title: DebtVis
problem: Visualizing national debt levels and their impact on future generations is often oversimplified.

title: CryptoShield
problem: DeFi protocols are vulnerable to flash loan attacks which are hard to simulate visually.

title: InsureView
problem: Insurance adjusters need to identify claim fraud by looking at social relationships between claimants.

title: StockCorrelation
problem: Traditional stock charts show prices but not the underlying sector rotations and correlations.

title: OptionEye
problem: The Greeks in option trading are abstract and difficult for novice traders to grasp visually.

title: SupplyChainFin
problem: Financial institutions lack visibility into the deep tiers of a supplier's creditworthiness.
visualization: Multi-tier Tree Diagrams, Risk Propagation Maps

title: RetailBankFlow
problem: Analyzing customer churn in retail banking requires understanding complex multi-channel behaviors.

title: ForexTrend
problem: Identifying currency patterns across multiple timeframes simultaneously is mentally taxing.

title: VentureGraph
problem: VCs need to track startup founders' previous successes and co-investor networks.

title: MortgageMap
problem: Predicting regional mortgage defaults requires combining demographic data with loan terms.

title: PensionVis
problem: Visualizing the long-term solvency of pension funds under different inflation scenarios.
visualization: Monte Carlo Simulation Plots, Fan Charts

title: ESGTracker
problem: ESG scores are often inconsistent; investors need to see the raw metrics visually.

title: CommodityFlow
problem: Global commodity trading involves physical and financial flows that are rarely visualized together.

title: CentralBankDashboard
problem: Central banks need a unified view of inflation, employment, and interest rates.

title: MicroLoanMonitor
problem: Tracking small-scale loan repayments in developing regions across fragmented data.

title: RegTechVis
problem: Compliance officers are overwhelmed by the volume of new financial regulations.

title: WealthGraph
problem: Private bankers need to visualize the wealth transfer between generations of a family.
visualization: Family Tree Graphs, Asset Allocation Pies

title: BondYieldCurve
problem: Interpreting the inversion of the yield curve across different countries and currencies.

title: AlgorithmicTradingVis
problem: Visualizing why an automated trading algorithm made a specific series of loss-making trades.

title: TaxHavenTracker
problem: Tracking offshore shell companies across multiple jurisdictions is visually complex.

title: PandemicFinance
problem: Visualizing the impact of COVID-19 stimulus packages on different economic sectors.

title: FinNewsVis
problem: Correlating financial news sentiment with real-time stock price movements.

title: ShadowBankingRisk
problem: Measuring the risk in the non-bank financial sector (shadow banking) via visual summaries.

title: InterbankMarket
problem: Large transaction networks hinder exploration of outliers like liquidity hoarding.
